MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CW9 & WA16 postcode area of Northwich & Knutsford. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:45PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:17PM on 18th January 2021
